K10amoghapu:3: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān potalake parvate viharati sma /
K10amoghapu:4: āryāvalokiteśvarasya bhuvane anekaśālatālatamālacampakāśokātimuktakanānāratnavṛkṣasamalaṅkṛte mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena sārdham aṣṭādaśabhir bhikṣusahasraiḥ navanavatibhiś ca
K10amoghapu:5: bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ anekaiś ca śuddhāvāsikāyikair devaputrakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta īśvaro maheśvarabrahmakāyikadevaputrān adhikṛtya dharmaṃ deśayati sma atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā praṇamya prahasitavadano bhūtvā bhagavantam etad avocat* /
K10amoghapu:6: asti mama bhagavan amoghapāśarājaṃ nāma hṛdayaṃ yan mayā pūrvam ekanavatikalpavilokitāyāṃ lokadhātau lokendrarājatathāgatasya arhatsamyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśād udgrahītaṃ yena bhagavān (AphSū 160)
K10amoghapu:7: īśvaro maheśvaradevaputrapramukhāni bahūni śuddhāvāsikāyikadevaputrapramukhāny anekadevaputraśatasahasrāṇi samādāpitāny anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau /
K10amoghapu:9: yasmiṃś ca punar bhagavan pṛthivīpradeśe idam amoghapāśahṛdayaṃ pracaret* /
K10amoghapu:10: veditavyaṃ bhagavan tasmin pṛthivīpradeśe īśvaramaheśvarabrahmakāyikapramukhāni dvādaśadevaputraśatasahasrāṇi rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye sthāsyanti /
K10amoghapu:11: caityasaṃmato bhagavan pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati yatredam amoghapāśahṛdayaṃ pracariṣyati /
K10amoghapu:14: yaḥ kaścid bhagavan kilviṣakārī syāt sarvapāpāspadaḥ pāpadharmasamācārī āryāpavādakaḥ saddharmapratikṣepakaḥ avīciparāyaṇaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhapratikṣepakaḥ saced vipratisāraṃ gacched āyatyaṃ saṃvaram āpadyate /
K10amoghapu:15: tasyaiva tāvad bhagavan upavāsajāpena ihaiva janmani tat karma viśudhyati parikṣayaṃ gacchati nivartitaṃ bhavati /
K10amoghapu:16: ekāhikena jvareṇa dvyāhikena tryāhikena vā cāturthikena vā jvareṇa evaṃ saptāhikena vā jvareṇa
K10amoghapu:17: akṣiśūlena vā dantaśūlena vā karṇaśūlena vā nāsāśūlena vā dantoṣṭhaśūlena vā jivhāśūlena vā tāluśūlena vā hṛdayaśūlena vā udaraśūlena vā pārśvaśūlena vā kaṭiśūlena vā aṅgaśūlena vā pratyaṅgaśūlena vā arśagrahaṇīśūlena vā atisāreṇa vā hastapādavedanayā vā śirorujā vā balāhakacitrakuṣṭhavicarcikākiṭibhabhagandaralohaliṅgagalagrahavisphoṭakāpasmārakākhordākhyair vā kṛtāpakṛtyair māraṇabandhanatāḍanatarjanabhūtākhyānair (AphSū 161) vā /
K10amoghapu:18: saṃkṣepato bhagavan kāyapīḍayā vā cittapīḍayā vā dusvapnadarśanena vā tat karma parikṣayaṃ gacchati /
K10amoghapu:20: prāg eva śuddhasattvānāṃ śraddhādhimuktikānāṃ yadi bhagavan catasraḥ parṣadaś catvāro varṇaḥ māyā imadhyanāpi ya idaṃ madīyam amoghapāśahṛdayaṃ śroṣyati udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati paryavāpsyati anyeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ śrāvayiṣyati antas tiryagyonigatānāṃ vā sattvānāṃ karṇapūṭe sthitvā karṇajāpaṃ dāsyati /
K10amoghapu:22: apratikṣepataḥ arūpataḥ avikalpataḥ asaṃprabhavataḥ aciram agamataḥ akaraṇataḥ niḥkleśataḥ samacittanikṣepataḥ virahitapañcaskandhaḥ /
K10amoghapu:24: tad eṣāṃ daśabhyo digbhyo buddhasahasraṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ kariṣyanti /
K10amoghapu:28: kiṃ bahunā bhagavann anyonyaspardhayā vā śroṣyati /
K10amoghapu:29: svāmibhayena vā parānuvṛttyā vā uccagghanahetunā vā śroṣyanti /
K10amoghapu:30: jñātavyaṃ bhagavan paṇḍitenāryāvalokiteśvarasyānubhāvena teṣāṃ karṇapuṭe sthitvā sa śabdo nipatiṣyati /
K10amoghapu:31: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścid eva puruṣaś candanaṃ vā karpūraṃ vā kesaraṃ vā kastūrikāṃ vā ākṛṣya paribhāṣya śilāyāṃ vā bhūmau vā piṣṭvā ātmānaṃ lepayet* /
K10amoghapu:32: na ca tasya candanasya karpūrasya kesarasya kastūrikāyāś caivaṃ bhavati anenāham ākṛṣṭaḥ paribhāṣito vā gandhenātikramiṣyāmīti /
K10amoghapu:34: evam eva bhagavann idaṃ madīyam amoghapāśahṛdayaṃ yaḥ kaścid uccaghana vā ullāpya /
K10amoghapu:37: teṣāṃ bhagavan khaṭukāṃ sattvānāṃ sa eva kuśalahetur bhaviṣyati /
K10amoghapu:38: yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra avirahitāś ca bhaviṣyanti śīlasamādhiprajñāpuṇyasaṃbhāragandhena
K10amoghapu:40: yaḥ kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāśako vā upāśikā vā tadanyo vā kaścit sattvaḥ amoghapāśahṛdayam uddiṣya śuklāṣṭamyām upavāsaṃ kuryāt* /
K10amoghapu:42: āvartayet* tasya bhagavan dṛṣṭa eva dharmā viṃśatir anuśaṃsāḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyāḥ /
K10amoghapu:43: katame viṃśati? yaduta rogāś cāsya kāye notpatsyante /
K10amoghapu:44: utpannāś cāsya rogāḥ karmavaśena śīghraṃ prasamaṃ yāsyanti /
K10amoghapu:56: saptavārān amoghapāśahṛdayena bhasmodakaṃ vā parijapya digvidig adha ūrdhvaś ca kṣetrasya bandho dātavyaḥ /
K10amoghapu:59: / sarvasattvānāṃ ca priyo bhaviṣyati mana-āpaś ca bhaviṣyati /
K10amoghapu:61: utpannaś cāsya śatrubhayaṃ śīghraṃ praśamaṃ yāsyati /
K10amoghapu:63: na ca kākhordabhayaṃ na ca ḍākinībhayaṃ na ca tīvrāḥ kleśopakleśā bhaviṣyanti /
K10amoghapu:64: nāgninā na viṣeṇa na śastreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti /
K10amoghapu:65: yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatrāvirahitāś ca bhaviṣyanti maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣayā /
K10amoghapu:68: katamān aṣṭau? maraṇakāle āryāvalokiteśvaro bhikṣurūpeṇa saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ dāsyati /
K10amoghapu:72: na pādavikṣepaṃ noccāraṃ na prasrāvaṃ na cārūḍhaḥ kālaṃ kariṣyati /
K10amoghapu:76: yatra yatra cāsya buddhakṣetre praṇidhis tatra tatropapattir bhaviṣyati /
K10amoghapu:78: dine dine trikālaṃ trīṇi vārān āvartayitavyam*
K10amoghapu:81: ayaṃ cāmoghapāśahṛdayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ balābalaṃ jñātvā śroṣayitavyaḥ
K10amoghapu:83: yasmād dhi gate malamātsaryerṣyāpagato bodhisattvā bhavanti /
K10amoghapu:84: sattvānām arthakaraṇena bodhiḥ prāpyate bodhisattvānāṃ gaṇanāṃś ca gacchanti /
K10amoghapu:86: etau dvau dharmau sattvānām arthakaraṇenaiva prāpyete /
K10amoghapu:87: sacen me bhagavann anujānīyād yan nv aham imaṃ hṛdayaṃ tathāgatasya purataḥ kīrtaye catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām arthāya hitāya sukhāyānyeṣāṃ ca pāpakāriṇām* /
K10amoghapu:88: atha khalu bhagavān āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad
K10amoghapu:91: anumoditaṃ tathāgatena paścimakāle paścimasamaye bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pitṛkāryaṃ kariṣyati
K10amoghapu:92: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nimiṣanayano bhūtvā bhagavantam etad avocat* /
K10amoghapu:93: śṛṇu me bhagavan sarvabuddhabodhisattvanamaskṛtam idaṃ vimokṣamukhamaṇḍalaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya vimokṣārthāya /
K10amoghapu:115: tadyathā Ō oṃ mune mune mahāmunaye svāhā /
K10amoghapu:116: oṃ śame śame mahāśame rakṣa rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca sarvapāpaṃ praśamane svāhā /
K10amoghapu:129: tadyathā Ō smṛtivarddhani mativarddhani gativarddhani dhṛtivarddhani prajñāvarddhani pratibhānavarddhani dhyānavarddhani samādhivarddhani śamathavarddhani vipaśyanāvarddhani /
K10amoghapu:134: ebhyo namaskṛtvā idam āryāvalokiteśvaramukhodgīrṇam amoghapāśarājanāma hṛdayaṃ tathāgatasaṃmukhaṃ bhāṣitaṃ mahatparṣanmadhye 'ham idānīm āvartayiṣye /
K10amoghapu:135: sidhyantu me mantrapadā sarvakāryāṇi sarvabhayebhyo mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca rakṣā bhavatu /
K10amoghapu:136: tadyathā Ō oṃ cara cara ciri ciri curu curu mara mara miri miri muru muru mahākāruṇika /
K10amoghapu:137: sara sara siri siri suru suru curu curu ciri ciri viri viri miri miri mahāpadmahasta /
K10amoghapu:138: kala kala kili kili kulu kulu mahāśuddhasattva
K10amoghapu:139: / buddhya buddhya bodha bodha bodhi bodhi bodhaya bodhaya kaṇa kaṇa kiṇi kiṇi kuṇu kuṇu paramaśuddhasattva /
K10amoghapu:140: kara kara kiri kiri kuru kuru mahāsthāmaprāpta /
K10amoghapu:141: cala cala saṃcala saṃcala vicala vicala pracala pracala eṭaṭa eṭaṭa bhara bhara bhiri bhiri bhuru bhuru tara tara tiri tiri turu turu ehy ehi mahākāruṇika /
K10amoghapu:143: dhara dhara dhiri dhiri dhuru dhuru tara tara sara sara cara cara para para vara vara mara mara lara lara hara hara hāhā hīhī hūhū oṃ kārabrahmaveśadhara /
K10amoghapu:144: dhara dhara dhiri dhiri dhuru dhuru tara tara sara sara cara cara nara nara vara vara hara hara raśmiśatasahasrapratimaṇḍitaśarīra jvala jvala tapa tapa bhāsa bhāsa bhrama bhrama (AphSū 166) bhagavan
K10amoghapu:146: / suru suru curu curu muru muru dhuru dhuru sanatkumārarudravāsavaviṣṇudhanadavāyvagni-ṛṣināyakavināyakabahuvividhaveśadhara
K10amoghapu:147: / dhara dhara dhiri dhiri dhuru dhuru tara tara thara thara dhara dhara
K10amoghapu:148: para para lara lara hara hara yara yara sara sara vara vara varadāyaka /
K10amoghapu:149: samantāvalokitavilokitalokeśvaramaheśvaratribhuvaneśvarasarvaguṇasamalaṅkṛtāvalokiteśvara muhu muhu muru muru muya muya muñca muñca rakṣa rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvopadravebhyaḥ sarvopasargebhyaḥ sarvagrahebhyaḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ sarvaviṣebhyaḥ sarvajvarebhyaḥ evaṃ bandha bandha tāḍanatarjanarājataskarāgnyudakaviṣaśastraparimocaka /
K10amoghapu:150: kaṇa kaṇa kiṇi kiṇi kuṇu kuṇu cara cara ciri ciri curu curu indriyabalabodhyaṃgacaturāryasatyasaṃprakāśaka
K10amoghapu:151: tapa tapa tama tama dama dama śama śama masa masa dhama dhama mahākāruṇika mahātamondhakāravidhamanaṣaṭpāramitāparipūraka
K10amoghapu:152: mala mala mili mili mulu mulu ṭaṭa ṭaṭa ṭhaṭha ṭhaṭha ṭiṭi ṭiṭi ṭhiṭhi ṭhiṭhi ṭuṭu ṭuṭu ṭhuṭhu ṭhuṭhu eṇeyacarmakṛtaparikara ehy ehi mahākāruṇika /
K10amoghapu:154: kara kara kiri kiri kuru kuru para para hara hara (AphSū 167) vara vara sara sara mara mara kara kara kaṭa kaṭa kiṭi kiṭi kuṭu kuṭu maṭa maṭa mahāviśuddhaviṣayanivāsina
K10amoghapu:156: śvetayajñopavītaratnamukuṭamālādharasarvajñaśirasi kṛtajaṭāmukuṭamahādbhutakamalālaṅkṛtakarataladhyānasamādhivimokṣāprakampya bahusattvasaṃtatiparipālakamahākāruṇika sarvakarmāvaraṇaviśodhaka sarvajñajñānaparipūraka sarvavyādhivimocaka sarvasattvāśāparipūrakasarvasattvasamāśvāsanakara namo 'stu te svāhā amoghāya svāhā /
K10amoghapu:170: idaṃ ca me karma kuru namo 'stu te svāhā /
K10amoghapu:171: oṃ raṇa raṇa hūṃ phaṭ* svāhā /
K10amoghapu:176: oṃ hrīḥ trailokyavijayāmoghapāśāpratihata hrīḥ haḥ hūṃ phaṭ* svāhā /
K10amoghapu:180: oṃ ārolik* hrīḥ hrīḥ hūṃ phaṭ* svāhā /
K10amoghapu:188: agarudhūpena sīmābandhaḥ bhasmodakena sarṣapakhadirakīlakādyaiḥ sarvajvareṣu sūtrakaṃ
K10amoghapu:192: udaraśūlena lavaṇodakaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ mṛttikayā udakena vā /
K10amoghapu:196: sīmābandhaṃ pañcaraṅgikasūtram ekaviṃśativārān parijapya caturṣu khadirakīlakeṣu baddhvā caturdiśaṃ nikhātavyaṃ sīmābandho bhaviṣyati /
K10amoghapu:201: cakṣuroge gandhodakapalāśodakaṃ madhuyaṣṭyudakaṃ vā sarvakalikalahavivādebhyaḥ abhyākhyāneṣūdakaṃ parijapya mukhaṃ prakṣālayitavyam* /
K10amoghapu:202: paraviṣayarājyopadravarāṣṭrakeṣu pūrṇakalaśaṃ sthāpayitvā śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā vācayitavyaṃ mahāśāntir bhavati /
K10amoghapu:203: tena codakena sektavyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ rakṣā kṛtā bhavati /
K10amoghapu:205: mudritāṃ candanatilakaṃ hṛdaye ekaviṃśativārān parijapya kartavyaṃ sarvānantaryāṇi kṣayaṃ yānti /
K10amoghapu:209: jayāvijayā-aparājitā nākulī gandhanākūlī dhāraṇī abhayapāṇi indriyapāṇigandhapriyaṃgutagaracakrā mahācakrā vikrāntāsomarājī sunandā ceti /
K10amoghapu:210: yathā saṃbhavata aṣṭottaraśatavārān parijapya maṇiṃ kṛtvā śirasi bāhau vā dhārayitavyam* /
K10amoghapu:211: bālānāṃ gale nārīṇāṃ vilagne svayaṃ paraṃ saubhāgyakaram* /
K10amoghapu:214: etena maṇinā baddhena sarvarakṣā kṛtā bhavati /
K10amoghapu:216: utpannāpi na pīḍāṃ janayiṣyati śīghraṃ praśamayiṣyanti /
K10amoghapu:217: grahān praśamayiṣyati vātameghāśanistambhanaṃ vāriṇā karavīralatayā sarvakarmakaram* /
K10amoghapu:218: āryāvalokiteśvarahṛdayaṃ paramasiddham asādhitam ete tāni karmāṇi kurute /
K10amoghapu:219: atha sādhayitum icchan vidhiḥ paṭe 'śeṣakair varṇakair buddhapratimālikhyāryāvalokiteśvaro jaṭāmukuṭadhārī eṇeyacarmakṛtaparivāsā paśupativeśadharaḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitaṃ kṛtvā poṣadhikena citrakareṇa
K10amoghapu:221: tataḥ sādhakena tasyāgrato 'patitagomayena maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā śvetapuṣpāvakīrṇam aṣṭāu gandhodakapūrṇakumbhāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ /
K10amoghapu:224: ahorātroṣitena vā trirātroṣitena vā triśuklabhojitā vā trikālasnāpayitā śucivastraprāvṛto bhūtvā jāpo dātavyaḥ /
K10amoghapu:225: tataḥ pratimāyā agrataḥ ātmānaṃ ca likhitaṃ paśyati taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca prahṛṣyati yāvat svayam evāryāvalokiteśvara āgacchati /
K10amoghapu:227: manaḥśilāñjanaṃ vā parijapya akṣiṇy aṃjayitvā tato
K10amoghapu:231: yad icchati tat karoty eva sādhaka iti /
K10amoghapu:232: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvas te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvās te śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
